___prompt_login.description: Whether to prompt the user to log in when token expired; otherwise automatically initiate login
___prompt_login.title: Prompt to log in

___reporting.description: Whether to report usage events to Mesosphere
___reporting.title: Usage Reporting

___dcos_acs_token.description: The token generated by authenticating to DC/OS with ACS
___dcos_acs_token.title: DC/OS ACS token

___mesos_master_url.description: Mesos master URL. Must be set in format: "http://host:port"
___mesos_master_url.title: Mesos Master URL

___dcos_url.description: The public master IP of your DC/OS installation
___dcos_url.title: DC/OS URL

___ssl_verify.description: Whether to verify SSL certs for HTTPS or path to certs. Valid values are True, False, or a path to a CA_BUNDLE.
___ssl_verify.title: SSL Verification
